item.title: [Announcement] Introducing the FreeDi Discord Server
item.description:
## ðŸŽ‰ We now have an official FreeDi Discord server!
Hey everyone ðŸ‘‹
Weâ€™re happy to announce that **FreeDi now has its own dedicated Discord server**! The goal is to make communication, support, and collaboration much easier for everyone.
In the past, we were using a single channel on another server, and over time it became clear that: - conversations were hard to organize - different topics got mixed up - important questions and answers were easy to miss
So we decided it was time for a fresh...
